titleStmt.title: Modesty amazed; or, The Dorset-shire damosel importunate with her mother to know Rogers meaningin [sic] wooing. In which she is fully satisfied by her mother; together with Rogers love and loyalty. To an excellent new tune, much in request. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon at the Angel in Guiltsput-street without Newgate.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Oh mother! Roger with his kisses ..."
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.

Wing says variants within holdings: in this edition the last word of the first line of title is "or,"; printed in four columns, with three woodcuts above the first two columns, and two woodcuts above the third and fourth columns.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guiltsput-street without Newgate.
